snippet: An unsuccessful appeal by FIFA’s lead investigator, Michael J. Garcia, challenged a summary of his report on potential corruption in the awarding of the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.
abstract: FIFA, soccer's world governing body, rejects Michael Garcia's appeal against alleged corruption around 2018 and 2022 World Cup bids.
lead_paragraph: An unsuccessful appeal by FIFA’s lead investigator, Michael J. Garcia, challenged a summary of his report on potential corruption in the awarding of the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.

headline.main: FIFA Rejects an Appeal by a Report’s Investigator
